Package net.sf.opengroove.client.plugins

Interface Summary
ConfigurablePlugin A plugin's supervisor class can implement this (in addition to net.sf.opengroove.client.plugins.Supervisor) to indicate that it has settings that can be configured.
Extension  
ExtensionPoint<E extends Extension>  
Supervisor  
 

Class Summary
AccumulatingExtensionPoint  
AccumulatingSupervisor A simple supervisor that can have any number of AccumulatingExtensionPoints associated with it.
DependencyModel  
EmptySupervisor An EmptySupervisor does nothing.
ExtensionContext  
ExtensionInfo  
ExtensionModel  
ExtensionPointContext  
ExtensionPointModel  
ExtensionWrapper  
IconModel  
LanguageContext This class makes available to a plugin the strings in it's current language pack.
PermissionModel  
Plugin This class represents a plugin.
PluginClassLoader This class is used to load plugin classes.
PluginContext A PluginContext is handed to all plugins when they are initialized.
PluginFileParser This class contains methods related to parsing and generating plugin configuration files.
PluginInfo  
PluginManager NOTES TO ME: the update site of a plugin is the URL that should be used to update the plugin and get version information for it.
PluginModel  
PluginUpdateSite  
UpdatePath An UpdatePath is a path to a particular folder within an update site.
UpdateSiteBrowser This class is an update site browser.
Version
